title: Wedding Peach, Vol. 01
description: The more Momoko and her friends discover about their new powers, the more Rain DeVilla and her evil henchmen vow to destroy them. In this episode, the girls are plunged into a world of darkness and illusion that tests the bonds of their friendship. How brightly will their love power shine against their new foe, Nocturne of the Night?
author: Nao Yazawa
